amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to express the Sense of Congress that the royalty rate for onshore Federal oil and gas leases be 12.5%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Ogles.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
